Profile_block

Superclass representing how a block is saved in the backend database, and related interfaces.

Properties

  • __table = ‘profile_block’ - table name
  • blocker - int(4) primary_key not_null
  • blocked - int(4) primary_key not_null
  • modified - timestamp() not_null default_CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
Summary
schemaDefReturns an associative array representing how the block is stored in the backend database.
existsReturns true/false whether $blocker has a block record on file for $blocked.

schemaDef

public static function schemaDef()

Returns an associative array representing how the block is stored in the backend database.

static function exists(Profile $blocker,
Profile $blocked)

Returns true/false whether $blocker has a block record on file for $blocked.
